column1: 18 months ago my son Eric Garner died at the hands of men who were supposed to protect him.?Eric was unarmed when a police officer choked him to death.? Weve got to do something about the violence in our communities—especially gun violence—and the racial and economic injustice thats connected to it.?" "Hillary seems to be the only candidate right now whos talking about how we can be strategic in trying to solve this problem

I like to look back on Eric as a child at Christmastime—he was a lover of the Christmas season
